wikitext.*:
'''Nick Austin''' is together with [[Pete Austin|Pete]] and [[Mike Austin]] the author of [[Colossal Adventure]], [[Adventure Quest]] and [[Dungeon Adventure]] which are part of [[the Middle-Earth Trilogy]] (reproduced as ''"The Jewels of Darkness"'').<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/level9.html The Middle-Earth Trilogy / The Colossal Trilogy] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 13 June 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQS, Tolkien Games] (retrieved 17 August 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=3 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] (retrieved 17 August 2010)</ref>
